Text: Well, I guess not for \n you if your boss is \n taking it out on you...
After losing the iron mask being used to \n control her, Raven was back to herself.
How'd you end up \n with these people?
I was at peace, but Lisa was more worried than \n ever about Banga Settlement's growing expenses.
I can smell a fire \n comin'.

He's quite upset that 
 the plans for the 
 amusement park facility 
 have been put on hold.

But it's good \n having her back.
Yeah... \n What happened \n back there?
We fought back in Hekseville, before becoming friends. \n Knowing Raven was safe helped me have the deepest sleep \n I've had since the gravity storm that dragged us away.
The past \n is the past.

 has been in a foul mood 
 lately and keeps taking 
 it out on us.

I see.

ZZZ

So that mask was \n behind everything \n that happened?
Not sure what they're up \n to, but you can be sure \n it's no good.

 have found a way to 
 stay rich, while the 
 poor just stay poor.

 brought reinforcements,

 and ran away in a hurry.

Hm, I see. That would \n make a significant dent \n in our labour costs...

 vigilant, make sure I 
 can warn people when 
 things go down.
They took me in and \n fed me. Then, everything \n went dark.

All the tax money just \n flows to Lei Havina...
After the storm, \n I ended up here...
How does she \n fit all of this \n in one body?
The old guy has a \n lot on his mind.
Stuff about Raven \n wearing a mask and a \n night gale.

Everyone's worried about

 keeping a tight fist on 
 their wallets.
Your appetite always \n gets you in trouble.
I'm sure that was Raven... I just have to find her and prove it.
First taxes, now \n conscription...
Conscription?
H-Hey, Kat, glad to see \n your head's feeling \n better.
*Sigh* The Council is \n trying to expand the \n Garrison army.
For what?
Not rightly sure, but \n there's gotta be \n somethin' behind it.
Hmm...
Never know when they'll \n start lookin' to the \n folks in Banga.

 garrison base is 
 somewhere above us, 
 right?

Fort Bismalia is way up \n above even Lei Havina.
I'm going to sneak in \n and have a look around.

No, he'd try to stop me. \n This has to be our \n little secret.

 and we've stepped up

The Bismalia's all the way past those wealthy islands.
I need to take breaks along the way if I'm going to reach it.
That's Fort Bismalia. Will Raven be there too...?
I'm almost there...
Huh!? An alarm?
It's still sooo far away.
What the-!? Not even a warning shot?
Phew, thanks Dusty!
Meow!
Getting close isn't \n gonna be easy.
There must be a better \n way...
Is this all of it?
Hm?
Yep, that's the last of \n the shipment.
Make sure this wine \n reaches the fort safe \n and sound.

Your wine won't make it \n if I'm blown out of the \n sky.

 She should still

Raven!

Well, you, before I \n knocked that mask off.

 but my head feels like 
 it's about to split
